title: Radek4921
author: Radek4921
content: Are there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?Even if you see the one that does it will take you months if not years to get to their minimum withdrawal amount.The reason why you see those casinos place in a free coin either hourly or daily or faucets in their casino is to enable those that are scared to put their money into their site to still be able to test their site without having to risk their money.So if you want to ever withdraw the money you get from a casino’s faucets then you have to wager with it and if you’re lucky enough to win a good odds game you might be able to withdraw but just if you want to just depend on claiming the rewards it will take a very long time for you to reach the minimum threshold, which IMO is a waste of time.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: These are some faucet gambling sites:  List Of Crypto Casinos with The Best FaucetsWhat most gamblers look for are sites with 100% deposit bonus and other better promotional offers. Faucets are a waste of time.Quote from: Cantsay on August 16, 2023, 11:34:34 AMThe reason why you see those casinos place in a free coin either hourly or daily or faucets in their casino is to enable those that are scared to put their money into their site to still be able to test their site without having to risk their money.Are you sure? Probably, but there are ways to make more people join their sites. Before I join this forum, I knew freebitco because it was a faucet site. Gambling sites do have free mode in a way you can play without money. Like on livecasino.io, it is called fun mode.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 16, 2023, 11:36:17 AMAre you sure? Or they are ways to make more people join their sites. Before I join this forum, I knew freebitco because it was a faucet site. It definitely will make more people use their site but we shouldn’t forget that the era of faucets is over so anyone that wants to start earning from it now will only be wasting the time they would have spent in a more productive space.Back then you could earn a significant amount from faucets but now what will 0.00000007BTC per hour do for someone? To me it’s still a waste of time to just rely on casino’s faucets entirely.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Look for casinos that are reliable and save up some money to deposit and get their welcome bonus. You can be lucky to have your chance of winning but faucets are no longer profitable.Quote from: Cantsay on August 16, 2023, 11:34:34 AMThe reason why you see those casinos place in a free coin either hourly or daily or faucets in their casino is to enable those that are scared to put their money into their site to still be able to test their site without having to risk their money.Casinos do that as a business strategy to win more players because if you get in there then you are attracted to sign up with them but apart from that, nothing more to it.

comments.author: Radek4921
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on August 16, 2023, 11:50:17 AMQuote from: Oshosondy on August 16, 2023, 11:36:17 AMAre you sure? Or they are ways to make more people join their sites. Before I join this forum, I knew freebitco because it was a faucet site. It definitely will make more people use their site but we shouldn’t forget that the era of faucets is over so anyone that wants to start earning from it now will only be wasting the time they would have spent in a more productive space.Back then you could earn a significant amount from faucets but now what will 0.00000007BTC per hour do for someone? To me it’s still a waste of time to just rely on casino’s faucets entirely.It is surely a waste of time. But let's say I need to earn a small amount of Coins, are there any other options apart from casinos and airdrops?In fact, once you could easily draw quite good amounts from the faucets, let me tell you that now I would have a few or a dozen bitcoins if I collected them - but they were much cheaper then and I didn't expect bitcoin to become so expensive.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:55:52 AMIt is surely a waste of time. But let's say I need to earn a small amount of Coins, are there any other options apart from casinos and airdrops?Do not think you can use casino to earn bitcoin, they are likely to earn from you than you will earn from them. It is good to know that airdrops can be fake, you need to be careful about airdrops and the phishing it can lead to. There are bounties, but I have not tried it before. Many bounties are on this forum.There are signature campaigns on this forum. Investing is still part of it. Hold bitcoin and let it increase in price.

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Although you're looking for a gambling site and it's correctly placed in this section, but you're technically not gambling because you're not risking any money. Faucet in gambling site is actually used for checking the trustworthiness about the game and how it works. Yeah some casino will let you to withdraw from faucet if you meet minimum withdrawal, but it's just a small reward for keep trying.

comments.author: Radek4921
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 16, 2023, 12:04:06 PMQuote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:55:52 AMIt is surely a waste of time. But let's say I need to earn a small amount of Coins, are there any other options apart from casinos and airdrops?Do not think you can use casino to earn bitcoin, they are likely to earn from you than you will earn from them. It is good to know that airdrops can be fake, you need to be careful about airdrops and the phishing it can lead to. There are bounties, but I have not tried it before. Many bounties are on this forum.There are signature campaigns on this forum. Investing is still part of it. Hold bitcoin and let it increase in price.You're right, although if the casino gives you something to start with - it wants to encourage me to play, so to encourage me, it gives me some coins. Playing for coins that are worth nothing doesn't make much sense to me. And depositing money and playing is already gambling, and at the moment I have nothing to play anyway so I wanted to try to win something for free.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Yes, as far as I know, freebitcoin is the only one that allows you not to need to make a deposit and can withdraw money there, but it takes time to be able to withdraw money and collect money little by little every hour, at least you are active every hour to play free spins there, apart from that there is also something called faucetpay now they have a lot of games in it for users to gamble from free money.But back to income, because the income you get is just free, of course not much, you only get a little to collect, maybe it can take a few days or months to withdraw money and withdraw, even if you use it to gamble, you won't necessarily be able to win it, because the dealer will always win even if it proves to be fair.

comments.author: Zoomic
comments.body: Quote from: Apocollapse on August 16, 2023, 12:19:50 PMAlthough you're looking for a gambling site and it's correctly placed in this section, but you're technically not gambling because you're not risking any money. Faucet in gambling site is actually used for checking the trustworthiness about the game and how it works. Yeah some casino will let you to withdraw from faucet if you meet minimum withdrawal, but it's just a small reward for keep trying.I have not heard about faucet in gambling but with what you explained here I believe it exists. But I am imagining how small the reward will be and how long it will take anyone to accumulate something that is withdrawable.I know that faucets were common in the early days of cryptocurrency, but now I do no think that it is a nice way to promote any site. Especially gambling sites rather utilize different types of bonuses instead of faucets as was mentioned.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:55:52 AMIt is surely a waste of time. But let's say I need to earn a small amount of Coins, are there any other options apart from casinos and airdrops?Buy btc and hodl. You can buy btc worth of at least $100 value if that is what you can afford and you can hodl it for something until the halving come. You can be lucky to have 100%, 200 or 300% increase on it. So imagine if you invested $1,000 or $2,000 worth of btc with such ROI. This is not an investment guide anyway but it is most reasonable thing to do with btc before halving.Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:55:52 AMIn fact, once you could easily draw quite good amounts from the faucets, let me tell you that now I would have a few or a dozen bitcoins if I collected them - but they were much cheaper then and I didn't expect bitcoin to become so expensive.I'm sure you never thought bitcoin will get such to that value now. Or if you knew about it then, you may not have invested like those who also said bitcoin was a bubble and those who used their bitcoin to pay for just pizza

comments.author: CryptorClub
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?You need to search "Crypto Faucet" or "Coin Faucet". You may also get a lot of free tokens on testnet of Blockchains, but it has no value, usually.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet There’s no such like you are asking for. Casino is a business and they earn profit through the losses of players in exchange for being entertained to their games and a chance to win.Some casino indeed offers fauce but it’s reward is too small for a user to grow up to the amount which is withdrawable. Also the casino will surely ban or restrict your account once you manage to consistently withdraw balance from them without any deposit.Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AM do you know any other sites you can recommend?I’ll recommend to use an actual faucet instead of a casino with faucet but you can use Blackjack.fun casino since they have a consistent daily airdrop for players by just claiming the code on the chatbox. The amount is really small but you can withdraw it if you manage to meet the requirement wager or minimum withdraw amount.

comments.author: rachael9385
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on August 16, 2023, 12:04:06 PMQuote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:55:52 AMIt is surely a waste of time. But let's say I need to earn a small amount of Coins, are there any other options apart from casinos and airdrops?Do not think you can use casino to earn bitcoin, they are likely to earn from you than you will earn from them. It is good to know that airdrops can be fake, you need to be careful about airdrops and the phishing it can lead to. There are bounties, but I have not tried it before. Many bounties are on this forum.There are signature campaigns on this forum. Investing is still part of it. Hold bitcoin and let it increase in price.I agreed with you mate @Oshosondy, from then till now I don't believe on free airdrops because it's a complete waist of time to be after doing all the conditions you can't get to withdraw Kobo from it so I don't give a fuck with airdrops, thinking to learn Bitcoin from a casino is never a good endeavor because you will end-up losing your money and waiting your time there, Bitcoin is the best for every beginners.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?These two you mentioned are faucet sites, earnings are not worth betting you have to be extremely lucky to cash out and sometimes it took months or even years to fast-track your earnings you should have a good number of referrals and your referrals should be active clickers too.A casino can not sustain their operation if there are no deposits coming and they just rely on faucets so is very rare if there's a casino that offers free money and you can cash out.

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?If you are a lucky guy and win that hourly reward or if you get any free spin or free bet and use that for gambling and win a good amount then you can withdraw that reward if you use any reputable casino site. But if your kyc is complete then try it then it might work. But I don't think you can win anything good for free. To profit from gambling, you must deposit there.  Nothing good can ever be achieved for free

comments.author: panjul07
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on August 16, 2023, 01:09:09 PMQuote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?These two you mentioned are faucet sites, earnings are not worth betting you have to be extremely lucky to cash out and sometimes it took months or even years to fast-track your earnings you should have a good number of referrals and your referrals should be active clickers too.A casino can not sustain their operation if there are no deposits coming and they just rely on faucets so is very rare if there's a casino that offers free money and you can cash out.They are not faucet sites, freebitco.in was popular as faucet site but they turned to be gambling site since years back although the faucet stays there. Duckdice is pure a casino site with faucet, I'm not sure how can you say it is also a faucet site. Basically it is possible to withdraw money without deposit in casinos with faucet without making deposits unless there is specific rule that it is not allowed. In the early stage of crypto gambling industry, most casinos provide faucet and I heard that there are some people who were lucky enough to turn faucet into hundred or even thousands buck.

comments.author: pawanjain
comments.body: Quote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?What is the purpose of that to be honest ?Freebitco.in is a faucet which provides few satoshis every hour and yes it does allow you to withdraw the earnings but all of such sites have a minimum withdrawal amount.I can't think of any genuine reason why would a person want to withdraw without depositing anything.

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on August 16, 2023, 11:34:34 AMQuote from: Radek4921 on August 16, 2023, 11:32:37 AMAre there sites where you can actually withdraw coins? I mean gambling sites. It doesn't have to be a lot of money, but I used to have the impression that there were more sites like this and it was much easier to withdraw free money. I know there is freebitcoin that gives you free btc every hour, duckdice is also a faucet - do you know any other sites you can recommend?Even if you see the one that does it will take you months if not years to get to their minimum withdrawal amount.The reason why you see those casinos place in a free coin either hourly or daily or faucets in their casino is to enable those that are scared to put their money into their site to still be able to test their site without having to risk their money.So if you want to ever withdraw the money you get from a casino’s faucets then you have to wager with it and if you’re lucky enough to win a good odds game you might be able to withdraw but just if you want to just depend on claiming the rewards it will take a very long time for you to reach the minimum threshold, which IMO is a waste of time. That's right, that free money will be so insignificant compared to the time spent.The reason for placing free coins by such casinos is a way to attract new users and it's not about the ability to test the website, but about their desire to interest the player in their casino and get a profit from his losses.No one distributes money just like that and will not allow them to be withdrawn from their website, because the purpose of free money is to be a bait for a beginner, so that he later brings his money to the casino and loses there. So there are limitations you describe.
